comments.comment: Excellent fix. The test GetWeekScheduleAsync_WithoutCache_ReturnsNull correctly reflects the new behavior where AgentService returns null when no cached data is available.
Great test coverage for NotSupportedException scenarios. Both tests properly verify the exception message content to ensure users get clear guidance.
Clear and informative warning message that explains both the issue and the solution to users.

The refactoring successfully removes the legacy _userProfile dependency and properly separates authentication concerns. The implementation correctly directs users to use PerChildMinUddannelseClient for live fetching operations.

All critical issues from previous reviews have been addressed. The implementation is now consistent, with no calls to methods that throw NotSupportedException and proper test coverage for all scenarios.

test_results.summary: Tests were not executed due to .NET SDK not being available in the current environment. Based on code review, all test issues have been resolved. The implementation correctly handles all scenarios without calling deprecated methods.
